content: crochet this sturdy basket using the beautiful waistcoat stitch also known as center single_crochet add leather or crochet handles these luxurious and practical baskets are a great way to add a touch of handmade and crochet to your home each waistcoat basket uses 3 skeins of wool-ease thick & quick yarn and is crocheted by holding two strands of yarn together at the same time
